name: S E V E R A N C E
name_original: S E V E R A N C E
description:
A decade ago, the Overflow transformed Sci-Two into a dying metropolis. In its remains, a smuggler stumbles upon a corpse, shipment of contraband, and gang of mercenaries out for his life. Meanwhile, a doctor rushes to rendezvous with a team of ex-soldiers in search of the cure for a disease tearing through the world. In their shadows, a scavenger who’ll do anything to turn a profit sees their predicament as the opportunity of a lifetime.

The fates of the three are intertwined with the miracle drug Halcyon, a by-product of Forges that power cities across the world. As they approach the truth, the Forge’s owners and a shadowy third party seek to eradicate anyone close to discovering the truth.

F E A T U R E S
  • Dive into a classic, SNES-era JRPG experience with a turn-based, ATB battle system
  • Experience story-rich experience with a focused, fast-paced adventure narrative exploring themes of mental health support, post-traumatic stress, and social class
  • Explore the dystopia of Sci-Two, traverse diverse dungeons, and tackle side-quests to find new weapons, items, and equipment for your party over 20+ hours
  • Earn AP through victory to learn new combat skills, abilities, and Riftwork magic and unleash them in battle
  • Take on challenging boss encounters that test your battle-system knowledge
